title: MWIC Bonus Episode 10: Autocar Meets Renault Brand CEO Fabrice Cambolive
description: Associate editor James Attwood speaks to Renault Brand CEO Fabrice Cambolive In this week's bonus 'Autocar Meets' podcast associate editor James Attwood speaks to Renault Brand CEO Fabrice Cambolive on the challenges of running the French firm, retro design, electrification and why he's got more to worry about than tariffs.You can make sure you never miss an Autocar podcast by subscribing wherever you get your podcasts. And if you'd be wiling to rate and review the Pod, we'd appreciate it more than you know, too.
